titleStmt.title: SII 4.356: original edition by H. Krishna Sastri
No. 356. (A.R. No. 33 of 1890). RIGHT OF ENTRANCE INTO THE TAYAR-SANNIDHI IN THE SAME TEMPLE.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrī . mahāmaṇḍaleśvaraṉ harirāyavibhāṭan śrīmatu pukkaṇauṭaiyar kumāra vīrakampaṇauṭaiyarkku cellāniṉṟa śakābdam 1000 2 100 8 10 8 l mel parābhava
samvatsarattu kumbhanāyiṟṟu pūrvvapakṣattu Ekādaśiyum viyāḻakkiḻamaiyum peṟṟa puṇar pūcattunāḷ jayaṅkoṇṭacoḻamaṇṭalattu Ūṟṟukkāṭṭu
kkoṭṭattu nakaraṅ kāñcīpurattu tiruvattiyūr niṉṟaruḷiya perumāḷ Aruḷāḷapperumāḷ koyilil Oṟiṟkuṟu tāticcikaḷil tummāṇṭi Akkacci makaḷ mutaliyar nācciyār Āṉa
Ellāntalaiyāṉa perumāḷtātiyeṉ Eṉṉuṭaiya kāṇi Āṭcciāṉa perumāḷ Aruḷāḷapperumāḷ koyilil tiruppuṟakkoṭaiyil kīḻaitiruvācalukku kiḻakku no
kkiṉa meṟṉokkiṉa tiruvītiyil naṭuviṟṟuṇṭattu kīḻtalaiyil teṉciṟakil tiruvītikku teṟku teṉpāṟkellai Ivvūril vyāpārikaḷil neṟkuppai Uṭaiyāṉ tirunaṭṭaṉ śivasannadhīśva
ramuṭaiyāṉ pakkal śrīirāmatīrtthaśrīpātaṅkaḷ koṇṭuṭaiya maṉaiyil vaṭakkil ceṅ kku vaṭakkum melpāṟkellai ṉ Uṭaiyapakkal śrīirāmatīrttha śrīpātaṅkaḷ koṇṭuṭai
ya maṉaikku kiḻakku kīḻpāṟkellai tiruvitikku meṟku Inta nāṟpāṟkellaikku naṭuvupaṭṭa maṉai kol Iraṇṭum koḷvāruḷaro Eṉṟu kūṟa Immoḻi keṭṭu Etirmoḻi koṭut
toṉ Āpastambasūtrattu bhāradvājagotrattu Aṇṇar koppaṇṇaṅkaḷ piḷḷaikaḷil Aiyyaṇṇaṅkaḷeṉ vilaikkuṟittāl (koḷ)koḷveṉ Eṉṟu kūṟa muṟkūṟiya
mutaliyarnācci Āṉa Ellāntalaiyāṉaperumāḷtātiyum piṟkūṟiya Aṇṇar koppaṇaṅkaḷ makaṉār Aiyyaṇaṅkaḷum Emmil Icainta vilaipporuḷ A
ṉṟāṭu naṭakkum vācippaṭā naṟ U 2 10 1 Ippaṇam Irupattu Ēḻukkum Iṉta maṉaiyum maṉaippaṭappaiyum maramum kiṇaṟum vilai Āvatu Ākavum Ituve poruḷmāvaṟu
tip poruṭcelavolai Āvatākavum Inta maṉaikku Oru kalaṉum Illai kalaṉuḷvāyt toṟṟuppaṭil nāṉe tirttukuṭukkakaṭaveṉākavum Inta maṉai Ivarkku viṟṟu Oṟṟi
pratigrahadāyadāṉataṉmaṅkaḷukkum maṟṟum Epperppaṭṭa sakala prāptikaḷukkum Urittāvatākavum Ippaṇam Irupattueḻum kāṭṭa Eṟṟi kiḻikaiccelavaṟa Āvaṇakkaḷari
ye kaikkoṇṭu Inta maṉaiyum maṉaippaṭappaiyum maramum kiṇaṟum vilaikku viṟṟu poruḷuṟa kaikkoṇṭu viṟṟu vilaipramāṇampaṇṇi kuṭutteṉ Aṇṇar koppa
ṇaṅkaḷ piḷḷaikaḷil Aiyyaṇaṅkaḷukku mutaliyarnācci Āṉa Ellāntalaiyāṉaperumāḷtātiyeṉ Ippaṭikku Ivai mutaliyarnācci Āṉa Ellāntalaiyāṉaperu māḷtāti Eḻuttu
Ippaṭikku Ivai Aruḷāḷanātaṉ rāyaṉ Eḻuttu .
Digital edition of SII 4.356 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Emmanuel Francis.
